item.title: What is API?
item.author: 7nolikov@gmail.com (Dmitrii Novikov)
item.description: Application Programming Interface is a tool that allows different software applications to communicate with each other. Think of it as a bridge that connects systems, enabling them to share data and perform tasks without knowing the details of how the other system works.
